# RETLflow

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

RETLflow package integrates *[RETL](https://github.com/vh-d/RETL)* and *[Rflow](https://github.com/vh-d/Rflow)* packages into a seamles ETL workflow framework for R.


## Installation

`RETLflow` can be installed from [GitHub](https://github.com/vh-d/RETLflow) by running:

``` r
devtools::install_github("vh-d/RETLflow")
```
